scripts.build: babel src/app.jsx -o dist/app.js && babel lib/dashboardSalesTable.js -o dist/dashboardSalesTable.js && npm run copy-libs
scripts.copy-libs: mkdir -p lib && cp node_modules/react/umd/react.production.min.js lib/react.min.js && cp node_modules/react-dom/umd/react-dom.production.min.js lib/react-dom.min.js
